name: Polblue Falls
description:
Introduction

Polblue Falls is a exciting trip to explore the Barrington Tops. It got a wet slot abseil.

Approach

Park at Polblue picnic area and walk down to the river. It might be good to put the wet suit on, depending on temperature.

Descent

Take care basalt is very slippery when wet. 500 meters walk. 7 meters abseil. 100 meters walk. 27 meters abseil. 800 meters walk. 2 options: Option 1: 40 meters bush abseil from a tree to the right. Option 2: Abseil 4 meters to a anchor on a tree. This abseil will take you in the cascade. Cross river. 15 meters abseil from tree. 5 meters abseil from small tree.

Exit

After the last abseil exit to the right up the ridge aiming for Adam's track. Follow the track to the main road and back to the car.

Red tape
